impact_weight: The increased use of renewable energy can reinforce the development of net-zero technology in road vehicles by providing a cleaner source of energy for electric vehicles.
The growth of renewable energy can aid the adoption of net-zero technologies in maritime transport by offering alternative fuels and reducing dependence on fossil fuels.
The development of renewable energy-based hydrogen production is indivisible from the creation of a hydrogen distribution infrastructure, as the two are closely linked in the hydrogen value chain.
The expansion of offshore renewable energy can enable the development of net-zero technologies in maritime transport by providing a source of clean energy for ships and ports.
Improving energy efficiency in buildings can reinforce overall energy efficiency efforts by reducing energy consumption and promoting the use of renewable energy sources.
The focus on energy efficiency in buildings might constrain the development of net-zero technologies in road vehicles by diverting resources and attention away from transportation sector innovations.
Policies aimed at ensuring social security in the energy sector can enable the development of urban mobility solutions by providing access to clean and affordable energy for transportation.
The growth of solar energy can reinforce the development of net-zero technologies in aviation by providing a source of clean energy for electric and hybrid-electric aircraft.
The increased adoption of solar energy can aid the development of net-zero technologies in road vehicles by providing a cleaner source of energy for electric vehicles.
